name: SPITE: Egar's Rage
description:
"Be at ease mortal, for my flames may torment you but they shall keep you alive in the cold. I am the Goddess of the Sun and I have chosen you to be my heir!"

SPITE: Egar's Rage

One night, eternal winter befell this world as monsters began rising and plundering the villages. With no warmth left, Egar, a lone drunkard, is suddenly met by a weakened Goddess of the Sun.

Scorch your enemies! Aim for the top of the mountain and become the true God of the Sun who will bring balance back into this realm!

FEATURES:
  • Diablo lll inspired combat gameplay
  • Three unique levels and menacing bosses
  • A dark, cold dystopian world with only you as the remaining heat source
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 2.6 GB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard / Mouse
